top_comment.text:
bullshit the worst characters on got are lysa arryn and Daenerys and the 
best one is littlefinger read the books before you judge this comment﻿
top_comment.author: Gbill Pap

comments.text:
Of source it's subjective depending on one's character and judgment. 
Whoever likes lysa is a total moron and he who likes daenerys has either 
not read the full series or he is a moron as well. As for littlefinger the 
fact that you think he is a douche means that you are a moral person… Yet 
when you play the game of thrones you win or you die, there is no middle 
ground nor any space for morality.
comments.author: Gbill Pap

comments.text:
its all subjective, i really like Jaime, still don't like Littlefinger, i 
think he's a douche
comments.author: mrmebs

comments.text: That's probably not going to happen until Season 5.
comments.author: BoukenCrimson

to your home now
